Content.Text:
<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Hummm... I want to do a new magic
experiment.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I wonder if <MYNAME> is going to come
today?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>! Perfect timing! I was just
hoping you'd turn up!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
I've got a request for you, <MYNAME>. Will
you help me out?
For you, anything!
Sounds suspicious...
Never!
I left the pan on the stove...

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, what a lovely sentiment! I knew you
were the right kind of guy. Let me
stroke you on the head!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, you want to know what you'll be
doing? I need you for a little human
testing. Don't worry, it'll be quick!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You said you'd do it, right?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can't take it back, right?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
I hate men who don't make up their
minds.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good, good. Let's go and get started.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hee hee hee! Let's get this experiment
started! Go!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you so much. We're finished.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Oh? You look a little pale. Are you
okay?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hey, <MYNAME>! Hang in there! <MYNAME>!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Phew, you're finally awake. I think you
passed out for a while.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I went a little far today. I'm sorry
about that.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
W-What's that look for? I apologize when
I know I'm in the wrong, okay?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm glad you've forgiven me. I was about
to cry if you didn't.
<PAGE>
I'm going home. Take care of yourself!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Hey. It's nothing like that. I just want
your help for a bit.
<PAGE>
Come on, follow me.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Oh dear. How pathetic.
<PAGE>
If you want to stay my boyfriend, you
need to toughen up a bit! This isn't the
worst you're going to face.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good, good, that's the spirit! I like
my men to have some stamina. Hang in
there!
<PAGE>
I'm going home. Take care of yourself!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
What? Your girlfriend is asking so much
of you, and you still just turn her
down?
<PAGE>
Enough! Get out my house!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Come on! I'll never forgive you for
this! I wanted to do that experiment!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>? Where do you think you're
running off to?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I can turn off your stove using my
magic, fear not.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What was in this pan? Your dinner?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm glad you've seen sense. I can't
stand a bad liar. Now come with me.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
You tried to lie to me, so I kind of
went all out with the experiment. It's
your own fault, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
I don't have to be a witch, just a
girlfriend to see through that kind of
obvious lie.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hope you've seen sense now! No more
lying, okay?
<PAGE>
I'm going home. Take care of yourself!
